mapper.select: SELECT p.post_no as 'postNo', u.user_no as 'writerNo', u.name as 'writer', p.title as 'title', p.content as 'content', p.created_at as 'createdAt', p.delete_NY as 'deletedAt', p.file_path as 'filePath', p.modify_user_no as 'modifyUserNo', p.modified_at as 'modifiedAt' FROM post p INNER JOIN user u ON p.writer_no = u.user_no WHERE post_no = #{postNo}
